subject: Re: [junit] IntelliJ IDEA JUnit Test Runner
msgSnippet: ... I m just about to make some quick screenshots, just added a bogus test to my current code at home ( new project, no tests yet, must change that ), mmm,
messageBody:
On Wed, 23 Apr 2003 20:51:07 +1200, javainsel wrote:

> So I installed that IDE to see what is so great. What appeared after
> starting a test is just the simple Swing test runner of JUnit.
>
> Is there a super duper JUnit Test Runner I missed in that IDE?

I'm just about to make some quick screenshots, just added a bogus test to
my current code at home ( new project, no tests yet, must change that ),
mmm, well I was going to, but I just installed the latest beta and it
seems to having issues with jdk 1.4.2-beta. I'll be at work in a hour or
so I'll post some screenshots from there.
